It is valid to return {@link IsBounded#BOUNDED} after returning {@link IsBounded#UNBOUNDED} * once the end of a restriction is discovered. It is not valid to return {@link * IsBounded#UNBOUNDED} after returning {@link IsBounded#BOUNDED}. + * + *
